name: ORAS Dark Pokemon Showdown Style
description: A primal kyogre, primal groudon and mega rayquaza based CSS made for Pokemon Showdown servers. If you see any errors or something that looks weird, please PM me in a server such as Origin.
additional_info:
To see this stylesheet download Stylish and add this style, and then load Pokemon showdown. 
Updates:

    7ᵗʰ April 2015:
      - darkened .chat-log to make the text more visible
      - changed .highlighted's background color

    11ᵗʰ April 2015:
      - set .header .logo to it's default
      - Added some credits
      - took off the mega rayquaza img in the chat.

    17ᵗʰ May 2015:
      - select fix.
      - teambuilder fixes.
      - .infobox text color and text shadow fixes.


    28ᵗʰ June 2015:
      - fixed the rainbow menugroup buttons.
